    \usepackage[utf8]{{inputenc}}
    \usepackage[vietnamese]{{babel}}
    \usepackage{tkz-tab,tikz}
    \usetikzlibrary{calc,intersections,patterns}
    \begin{document} 

\begin{tikzpicture}
 		\tkzTabInit[nocadre=false, lgt=1.3, espcl=2] 
 		{$x$ /0.7,$f'(x)$ /0.7}
 		{$-\infty$,$-1$,$1$,$2$, $+\infty$}
 		\tkzTabLine{,+,0,-,0,+,0,-,} 
 		\end{tikzpicture}


\end{document}
